timeline.bodyText: As far as I can see, List.copyOf actually gets all the elements in the list. So the lazyness would be gone in this case.
timeline.author: tomas-langer

replies.bodyText: I am not sure if we do need the copy, it's  unmodifiable list all the time, but I could have missed something WDYT @romain-grecourt ?
replies.author: danielkec

replies.bodyText: Right, this list shouldn't need to be copied.
replies.author: romain-grecourt

timeline.message:
Get rid of laziness breaker
